rules.description: Alt+F4 => Cmd+Q (Exit application)
Home => Cmd+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line)
Shift+Home => Cmd+Shift+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with selection)
Cmd+Home, Cmd+Shift+Home => Cmd+Up arrow, Cmd+Shift+Up arrow (Move cursor to beginning of file with and without selection)
End => Cmd+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line)
Shift+End => Cmd+Shift+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line with selection)
Cmd+End, Cmd+Shift+End => Cmd+down arrow, Cmd+Shift+down arrow (Move cursor to end of file with and without selection)
Cmd+(Shift)+Right/left arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/left arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection)
Cmd+Shift+Esc => Open Activity Monitor
Return => Cmd+o (Open) (Only in Finder)
Delete => Cmd+backspace (Delete) (Only in Finder)
Cmd+Left Click => Cmd+Left Click (select multiple items)
MouseCursor Mode [Right CMD/TAB as Trigger Key]
TouchCursor Extended Mode [CAPSLOCK as Trigger Key]

Delete => Cmd+backspace (Delete) (Only in Finder)
